text: The APAF system web server shall be password protected where appropriate to allow only pertinent ASPERA-3 team members access.
The user shall be able to initiate processes from an interface provided by the HATS-GUI.
When a user selects the View/Text menu option, the HATS-GUI shall prompt a user to select a pretty-printed text file in the current application.
This is the function that is responsible for determining the possibility of satisfying the user, given his budget and deadline.
The BE shall respond to incoming correlator mode changes, user optional processing sequence and/or parameter changes, and other external inputs that affect the data processing pipeline.
Allow agents to join and leave multicast group.
The user must undo and redo its last thousand actions.
The system must track the workflow between senders and related replies.
Administrative users can give other users administrative access up to their own access level only.
The Search module of the CCTNS gives police personnel the ability to execute a basic or advanced search on cases.
PO (Purchase Order) Response is sent by the Sales Point (Seller) to inform the Order Point (Buyer) of the intention to supply goods or perform services in response to a Purchase Order.
The solution should enable the user to track the submitted defect or enhancement request.
The system shall display a list of all the objects the user currently has in the system.
The system shall require the users enable cookies to use the system.
The System must at a minimum be able to provide reports for actions on cases organised.
The System should allow a user to stipulate which other users or groups can access cases.
All error messages produced by the System must be meaningful, so that they can be appropriately acted upon by the users who are likely to see them.
With the use of an existing Passport account the user can login to the messenger.
The System must provide End User and Administrator functions which are easy to use and intuitive throughout.
Ability to reset user passwords when needed
Suggested more than one individual can have administrator privilege to ensure advisability.
Ability to select a privacy policy that has been assigned to them by the project manager.
Ability to add, delete and update access control policies such as subject, object, action.
The system will allow analysts to enter a new goal into the system as new goals are identified.
If the order is incorrect, the customer will be able to revise and update their order.
Customers will be presented with an unambiguous interface to assist in browsing the categories and products.
The WebOrder system shall send an e-mail confirmation to the customer that the items they ordered will be delivered to the shipping address along with tracking number.
Inter faculties transfer: request can be made by any authorised user and approved by faculty group or higher level
Any administration level or authorised inventory group member can display all pending requests waiting for approval from this level and approve those requests
The Clarus system shall calculate derived environmental data from observations.
The Clarus system shall process data as they are received.
The Clarus system shall implement continuous quality control processes.
The Clarus system shall be able to implement quality control rules specific to observation locations.

When the user begins the MultiMahjongClient program, they will be able to choose to create a new multi player game, to create a new single player game, to join an existing multi player game, or to quit the program.
Any user who creates or joins a game will be able to upload their own JPEG or GIF image that they wish to have displayed above their name, if they do not wish to use a preset icon.
The Clarus system shall acquire, process, and disseminate atmospheric data.
The Clarus system shall accept only observations of known measurement types and units.
The Clarus system shall be able to collect environmental data that are manually entered.
The Clarus system shall enable environmental data queries by quality.
The Clarus system shall use software that implements industry accepted standard interfaces.
The Clarus system shall support 470 million current observations.
The Clarus system shall respond to a request for information within one minute.
The Clarus program shall establish data sharing agreements with all participating sources of environmental data.
The Clarus program shall define quality control rules for environmental observations.
The application should be coloured so that the screen shots can be printed out clearly (i.e., black on white background).
If any of mandatory information is missed or any false information is existing then the field office will reject the claim back to VSP and the system will keep those claim in a quarantine area.
When the user logs onto the system on the date of their reminder, they shall receive a popup window displaying their reminder message.
Systems supporting OM must provide the ability to control the configuration of and revisions to investigation-specific questionnaires.
The user shall be able to find projects by project ID, project name, project status, structure ID, and program.
The user shall be able to edit or delete existing projects.
The administrator shall be able to assign bridge-level filters for each user.
Provide a centralized archive for user’s information.
Watershed uploaders have responsibility to upload local data requiring write access to space allocated to their specific watershed.

The Data Management portion of the system shall permit user access from the corporate Intranet and, if a user is authorized for outside access through the corporate firewall, from an Internet connection at the user’s home.
The system shall provide browsing options to see product details.
The system shall allow user to update the profile information.
The system shall allow user to enter the contact number for support personnel to call.
The system shall enable user to select the shipping method during payment process.
The system shall allow user to select the order to be changed.
The system shall display all the available promotions to the user.
The system shall provide for replication of databases to off-site storage locations.
The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing the user’s password.
ETCS shall be compatible with existing national systems listed in the CCS TSI such that it does not interfere with the national systems and is not interfered with by the national systems.
The DUAP Input Services shall be able to collect probe vehicle data from Detroit Department of Transportation (DDOT) Transit using the DDOT interface.
The DUAP System shall be able to collect Origin/Destination (O/D) data.
The DUAP System shall be able to collect road condition data.
The DUAP Computational Services shall be able to derive congestion level based on volume to capacity from probe vehicle data.
The System shall provide the capability to notify customers upon the NPOESS Ground System entering and leaving a Degraded Operations Mode.
The System shall be capable of aggregating Data Products up to and including one orbit.

A minimal set of identifying information/metadata concerning rejected submissions should provide a mechanism to eliminate the need to review some resubmissions. Certain reasons for rejection should prevent a possible resubmission.
Accommodates a resubmitted SIP in case of errors resulting from the SIP submission.
Stores the identification information in the Data Management database to support search and retrieval of AIPs in Archive Storage.
Creates and maintains schema or table definitions required to support Data Management functions.
Has capability to generate and provide management reports and statistics such as summaries of updates by category, user codes, etc.
Submission volumes and schedules are managed and monitored.
Receives migration packages from Preservation Planning.
The system must be able to capture and organize voice clips that can be used where appropriate.
Actors in the course administrator role may not feel the need to provide web feeds for every page in their course.
The course administrator should also be able to attach feedback in the form of text or an attachment (as described above).

The system should be configurable from a single source at a central administrative position, and should provide a central, easy-to-use interface that will allow administrators to configure the user interface and features in a way that reduces page clutter.
The system will provide tools to assist in the quality control/quality assurance of WUP data.
Report on the permits that have been relocated by a permit holder.
The CAISO shall from time to time undertake performance tests, with or without prior notification.

Interaction protocols between Peering Agent are identified.
User can click on [ view detail ] for more information about a customer.
Professor will be able to ask questions to students and expect an answer immediately.
If professor makes a change or ads to the syllabus or any other document the change will be instantly distributed to all students that have those documents in their space.

The users of the PMS are expected to be academic personnel and students with various technical backgrounds.
Decon Associate: A member of the Construction Junction staff who executes a deconstruction and/or strip out job and brings the items for processing at the receiving dock.

The software developer shall provide complete data specifications for authority records, bibliographic records, order records, item records, hold/request records, and other records maintained or accessed by Management Processes.
The system provides a utility and reports for identifying item records to purge, based on customizable criteria such as: an item has been in status "missing" for more than X months.
System provides a management console displaying workstations running client software; workstation name and IP address; and utilities for managing and killing client sessions.
System provides a user-friendly interface for designing queries against all record types.

Users are allowed to instantly access other main application interfaces(specifically create archive interface and extraction interface-these features are described in following chapters), as well as changing view mode for objects(archives and files) displayed in file manager interface.
Torrent search will share the same search bar with the streaming search.
The workﬂow system shall have a conﬁgurable management strategy for migration from ARCs to WARCs.
The system shall provide the capability to open a pop-up window displaying information about the specific page along with links to supporting help topics upon selecting each Help link.
The ELSS must provide facilities to capture and deliver for transmission corrections to previously successfully transmitted data.
A product supplier will be provided with the opportunity to publish details of their ELSS Approved product on the ELSS Approved Product Register on the UK Fisheries public website.
A user shall be able to override planned parameter values, through the DH website, or if available, through manual switches on household devices
The system allows for the backup of the data system to local or remote non-volatile storage systems.
Users can combine multiple pdf documents in a single pdf document through a user friendly graphical interface with simple utilities.
The Data Architecture describes the structure of an organization's logical and physical data assets and data management resources.
